Class VuMatchClient

    This class contains all functionality needed to contact VuMatch API

      • VuMatchClient

        public VuMatchClient(Context context,
             String customerId,
             String appKey,
             String appToken)
        Construct a client object used to connect to VuMatch API
        Parameters:
        context - valid Android context
        customerId - your customer id resistered to VuMatch API
        appKey - your application key resistered to VuMatch API
        appToken - your application token resistered to VuMatch API

    • Method Detail

      • postImage

        public void postImage(String category,
             Uri imageUri,
             VuMatchAPIAccessCallbackHandler callback)
        Post an image to VuMatch API and get a list of recommendations
        Parameters:
        category - product category
        imageUri - Uri to the image to be uploaded
        callback - callback handler to receive response from VuMatch client while processing your request
